text: The Congress of the Union (), formally known as the General Congress of the United Mexican States (Congreso General de los Estados Unidos Mexicanos), is the legislature of the federal government of Mexico consisting of two chambers: the Senate of the Republic and the Chamber of Deputies. Its 628 members (128 senators and 500 deputies) meet in Mexico City. ==References== Category:Government of Mexico Category:Organizations based in Mexico
title: Congress of the Union
